mapper.sql: DEFINITION_ID, COMP_ID, DEFINITION_NAME, DEFINITION_LEVEL, MAPPING_DB_FIELD, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG, PARTNER_LEVEL
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION (COMP_ID, DEFINITION_NAME, DEFINITION_LEVEL, MAPPING_DB_FIELD, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG, PARTNER_LEVEL) values (#{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{definitionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{definitionLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mappingDbField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{partnerLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION
COMP_ID,
DEFINITION_NAME,
DEFINITION_LEVEL,
MAPPING_DB_FIELD,
CREATION_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,
DEL_FLAG,
PARTNER_LEVEL,

update FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION
DEFINITION_ID = #{record.definitionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEFINITION_NAME = #{record.definitionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFINITION_LEVEL = #{record.definitionLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAPPING_DB_FIELD = #{record.mappingDbField,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_TIME = #{record.creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEL_FLAG = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
PARTNER_LEVEL = #{record.partnerLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},

update FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION set DEFINITION_ID = #{record.definitionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEFINITION_NAME = #{record.definitionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINITION_LEVEL = #{record.definitionLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAPPING_DB_FIELD = #{record.mappingDbField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_TIME = #{record.creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEL_FLAG = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, PARTNER_LEVEL = #{record.partnerLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}

update FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION
COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEFINITION_NAME = #{definitionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFINITION_LEVEL = #{definitionLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAPPING_DB_FIELD = #{mappingDbField,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
PARTNER_LEVEL = #{partnerLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where DEFINITION_ID = #{definitionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION set COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEFINITION_NAME = #{definitionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINITION_LEVEL = #{definitionLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAPPING_DB_FIELD = #{mappingDbField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, PARTNER_LEVEL = #{partnerLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT} where DEFINITION_ID = #{definitionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select TOP 1
distinct
from FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION
order by ${orderByClause}

select from FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION WHERE DEL_FLAG = 0
AND COMP_ID IN (SELECT COMP_ID FROM FUN_COMP WHERE MAIN_COMP IN (1, 2))
AND COMP_ID = #{compId}
ORDER BY DEFINITION_LEVEL ASC

select from FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION WHERE
COMP_ID IN (SELECT COMP_ID FROM FUN_COMP WHERE MAIN_COMP IN (1, 2))
COMP_ID = #{compId}
ORDER BY DEFINITION_LEVEL ASC
mapper.update: update FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION set PARTNER_LEVEL = 1 where COMP_ID = #{compId} and DEFINITION_LEVEL = #{partnerLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DEL_FLAG = 0
mapper.select: SELECT FROM FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND DEL_FLAG = 0 AND DEFINITION_LEVEL >= (SELECT DEFINITION_LEVEL FROM FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND DEL_FLAG = 0 AND DEFINITION_ID = #{organizationDefinitionId}) ORDER BY DEFINITION_LEVEL
select from FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION where COMP_ID=#{compId} and DEFINITION_ID = #{defId}
SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID range FROM dbo.FUN_ORGANIZATION WHERE ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION_ID = #{defId} AND DEL_FLAG = 0 AND COMP_ID = #{compId}
select from FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION where COMP_ID=#{compId} and DEFINITION_ID = #{defId}

SELECT DEFINITION_LEVEL FROM FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION where COMP_ID =#{compId} AND DEFINITION_ID = (select ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION_ID from FUN_ORGANIZATION where ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId})

select from FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION where COMP_ID=#{compId} and DEFINITION_ID in
#{listItem}
select TOP 1 from FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION WHERE COMP_ID =#{compId} AND DEL_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY DEFINITION_LEVEL DESC

select A.DEFINITION_LEVEL from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DEFINITION_LEVEL desc) AS DEFINITION_LEVEL,DEFINITION_ID from FUN_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITION where COMP_ID=#{compId} and DEL_FLAG = 0) A where A.DEFINITION_ID = #{defId}
